    vs_3_0
    def c220, 0, 0, 0.0625, 0
    def c0, 0, 1, 0, 0
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_position o0
    dcl_2d s0
    dp4 r2.x, v0, c6

    texldl r1, c220.z, s0
    mul r1.x, r1.x, c250.x
    add r2.x, r2.x, r1.x
    mov o0.x, r2.x

    dp4 o0.y, v0, c7
    mov o0.zw, c0.xyxy
